text: Всем привет! Отдыхали вместе с друзьями в конце марта 2025 года. Очень замечательный и симпатичный отель, уютная зеленая территория, по которой бегают бурундуки и можно встретить варанчиков, в прудах плавают цветные рыбки и черепахи. Широкий чистый пляж с волейбольной площадкой. Хорошие шезлонги на травке. Дружелюбный и вежливый персонал. Чисто, опрятно, всё работает. Все номера с видом на океан, большой балкон, новый кондиционер. Рекомендую брать all inclusive, чтобы не тратить время на поиск места, где перекусить. Еда разнообразная, выбор есть: с местным колоритом - острая и обычным вкусом. Вкусное шоколадное и ванильное мороженное, десерты и фрукты. Пепси, миринда, севенап и тоник - оригинальные. Пиво Lion хорошее, из крепких рекомедую тёмный арак (ром). Если кто курит, то сигареты берите с собой, здесь они они стоят очень дорого и качество не очень. Обязательно рекомедую ознакомиться с местными достопримечательностями: посетить реку Бентота, буддийский храм, фруктовые, чайные и сувенирные лавки. Из экскурсий рекомедую - посетить город Элла, малый пик Адама, водопад, чайные плантации, прокатиться на местном поезде по красивым местам; съездить на остров с маяком и обязательно на рыбалку в океан, там в дали от берега вы увидите красивейший океан, обязательно искупайтесь, возможно встретите дельфинов или китов. Во время движения тролинг и донная рыбалка. Все что поймаете, вам могут приготовить. По всем экскурсиям и путешествиям рекомедую обращаться к Дилану (ватсап +94 77 625 7261) русскоговорящий гид, он все организует, очень приятный человек, профессионал своего дела, всегда внимательно выслушает вас и постарается исполнить ваши пожелания. Можете найти его на пляже гостиницы. Всем хорошего отдыха, Роман и Лариса!
title: Отдых на Шри-Ланке

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
Morning Star is an absolutely perfect place to stay for anyone visiting Mirissa. One minute from the stunning beach, the location is ideal and the rooms were large and comfortable. Most importantly, the guest house is family run, and the staff were so incredibly helpful and kind. They were full of ideas, offered wonderful meals, were able to arrange travel when I left, and even arranged a quick, easy and cheap PCR test before my flight home. 

Thank you so much to the whole family and all the staff, who made my experience in Mirissa so easy and comfortable!
title: Perfect experience!

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text: 5/5, great place, lovely family running the business. Recommend staying here. We had very good time. They were very friendly. Breakfast was good. Got the best price, even took us to the next hotel. Great location. Superb breakfast, the premises were clean and hygenic.
title: We had a great stay at the Morning star

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
We initially booked one night at Morning Star, but after seeing the property, the spacious clean rooms, and getting such a warm welcome we immediately booked the remainder of our trip to stay here. We were in Sri Lanka for our honeymoon and the owners made the occasion really special, decorating our room with fresh flowers, balloons and even giving us some homemade cake. We loved everything about our stay here.

The location - a short walk from the main beach, but just across the road from the turtle bay beach which is more unspoilt. The property extends really far back so it’s very peaceful where the rooms are and by the pool.

The rooms- We stayed in one of the superior rooms, it was very spacious and spotlessly clean. The shower was the best we had during our time in Sri Lanka (powerful and lots of hot water if you wanted it). The rooms must have had good sound insulation as they were really quiet which made for a great nights sleep. 

The pool - The cleanest pool I have ever seen and obviously tended to on a regular basis by the owner. The pool area was a haven, overlooking tropical plants and trees, peacocks, and even monkeys. 

Breakfast - A huge fresh breakfast was available every morning, and the owners were very flexible about timings. We liked to surf early morning  and had breakfast around 10am, but on our last morning due to a lunch time flight we were able to have breakfast at 0630, nothing seemed like too much trouble. Our
breakfast usually consisted of fresh coffee, a big plate of tropical fruit, fresh yogurt and honey, fried eggs and toast (with homemade bread). 

The people - Morning Star is family run and while
being very professional you are also made to feel at home and cared for. The family and staff (Sriyani) were some of the kindest most genuine people we have met and had a real talent for hospitality. We were always met with genuine smiles and warmth. 

If you want a clean, peaceful and relaxing place to stay Morning Star is for you. Thank you so much to the family and Sriyani for making our stay so special, we hope we can come back soon 😊
title: Amazing Stay at Morning Star

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text: Family owned hotel. Large rooms. Very clean. Beautiful swimming pool. 50 meters from the  Turtle Beach. I stayed for two weeks. Very warm welcoming. The family helps with anything in need, including help with renting surf board, laundry,  money exchange, transportation from/to airport. Breakfasts are huge and very tasty. Fruits, yugort, eggs, coffee pancakes and local tasty things.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
title: Outstanding stay at Morning Star

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
Our family stayed here in the beginning of March for 5 nights.
At first we were a little skeptical but our expectations were met.

As we are a family the room consists of two big beds in one space. The only comment I can have is there are to many pillow blankets etc... on the bed. Beds are good and big. 

The family is very helpful and every answer to a question is no problem and they help in every way. They are also honest if something is not good if advise is asked.

The son brought us to our next location and we were given a cake once we left. 
Tuktuks are arranged upon request, breakfast is generous.

Pool is also lovely, especially when the monkeys come have a look. No worries about "the busy road".

Stay safe and healthy!
title: Nice family run hotel

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
We cannot recommend this wonderful hotel enough, not only is it in a perfect location within Marrisa, the hospitality at the Morning Star was absolutly faultless. 
So friendly and helpful, they allowed us to stay longer than we had originally booked when our tour was cancelled due to Covid 19.
The hotel is a stones throw from the beach, the beach where they had the perfect seafood restaurant and an area of beach where you can swim with the sea turtles.
The hotel is also within walking distance to some really nice places to eat and drink.
We plan to return next year and stay at this wonderful hotel again.
title: Perfect place to stay

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
roomTip: The garden rooms near the pool are unbeatable.
text:
Our third visit and we were welcomed as old friends, even by Brave, the family dog. The family who run the hotel have been so helpful each time we have stayed. Rooms are very good, always clean and well looked-after by a lovely local lady. Breakfasts are spectacular. The pool is delightful and visits by the local monkey troop are a daily highlight. Other wildlife is often in evidence - birds, chipmunks, lizards, even the occasional mongoose.

If you want a relaxed, comfortable few days you won't find anywhere better. If you fancy trips out (whale-watching recommended) the family will arrange them and transport to the next destination is never too much trouble for them.

Definitely five stars in every category from us!
title: Marvellous family hotel

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
We stayed three days at the Morning star and I can just recommend you to stay there.
The place is just amazing. Well decorated, confortable, authentic. The swimming pool area is great. you can enjoy swimming and watching the monkeys at the same time.
The owners are a family really kind and very helpful.
The beds are really confortable, and everything is clean and proper.
The breakfast is delicious. Turtle beach is accross the street; where you can swim with turtles. 
The only recommendation would be not to go to the spa/massage center proposed. The lady who did the massage to me is clearly not giving what we expect.
Instead I recommend you to contact Anurandha (+94.71.315.0080). Just amazing. Check on trip advisor the comments written on this guy. He is one of a kind!
Thanks to the morning star for everything!
title: Peaceful place, prefect to relax, family house

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
I had the most delightful stay at this immaculately clean and well run hotel. 
Nothing is too much trouble for the hosts to make sure that the traveler has the perfect stay. 
The rooms are spacious and airy. The hotel is set in beautiful grounds with a lovely pool area just right to sit out at if you feel like a break from the beaches. 
One of the best beaches in mirissa, turtle bay, is just a 100meter walk from the hotel front door. Snorkelling and sunbathing are lovely here. 
I can’t recommend Morning Star highly enough. Stay here and you certainly won’t be disappointed. Breakfast is amazing 😉 
Five stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: Fantastic friendly family hotel

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text: My wife and I arrived the Morningstar hotel feb 4 and stayed for five days. We  were a little concerned for the location, close to Main Street, but this was never a problem. The hotel section was located behind the front building and we had absolutely no noice.  The only “noice” came form the jungle , and that was just fantastic.. the room was big and clean with a big terrace outside. Sitting there in the evening with a night cup was just great.. from the first moment, the hosting family was extremely nice and helpful. Nothing was a problem. We became like a member of the family.  Always a smile from everyone.  The breakfast was also an great experience. Always a a fruit platter as a starter. It was just delicious. After that you selected what you wanted, and the taste was excellent. We also had dinner in the hotel.  A new dish every day ,always tasteful and very good. A very good beach was located two minutes walk from the hotel.  Everyone on in beach operation were also very service minded and friendly. We will definitely return to this hotel in the future
title: Best hotel experience ever

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
Family run resort with an unparalleled focus on hospitality and comfort of their guests. Beautiful surroundings, comfortable rooms that always smell of fresh flowers and the beach is across the road. 

Welcomed with cold napkins, juice and a 2 mins early check-in. They helped us book our whale watching safari with Raja and the whales which is another amazing company in itself. Their son Jaya dropped us to our next destination at a reasonable price in their family car too. 

Breakfast is wholesome and the home made yogurt with honey is to die for. 

I would visit Mirissa again just to stay with Anura and family.
title: Exceptional hospitality, 2 mins to the beach, 5 mins to Coconut Hill and Parrot rock.

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text: Me and my friend stayed at this hotel three nights and we had a really good time. Most friendly owner family, very helpful with everything. Exellent breakfast. The pool area was relaxing and clean. We kan highly recommend this place.
title: Lovely stay in Mirissa

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text: We stayed for our honeymoon in the Queen Room and it was perfect. The bed was very comfy and the facility are great. The breakfast is so yummy! The pool is a fab size set in a beautiful garden. The family are amazing decorating our room for us and providing amazing Hospitality. Don’t be put off by the front when you walk through it’s paradise in the back garden. Lovely place with lovely touches.
title: Perfect stay will return

placeInfo/address: Bandaramulla, Mirissa 81740 Sri Lanka
text:
Morning star on arrival looks small but it runs right out the back to a beautiful pool setting with loungers & bean bags.Amazing furniture dotted throughout the premises & statues & walk art. Truly fabulous.

This family are the best at what they do.

Greeted with fruit juices & cold towels. The chief as he calls himself very friendly. Our room was a queen room no.04 omg it’s like walking into heaven. 

Huge four poster bed with a mountain of luxury cushions, the best mattress on our Sri Lanka journey! 

The bathroom is proper 5 star & the rain shower amazing hot water every time. Huge balcony to sit out in with chairs & cushions overlooking pool. 

I can’t rate this place highly enough!

The breakfast is where the magic happens everything presented with a little flower & a smile! Huge platters of fruit then wonderful cooked eggs by one of the sons Jyan.. what came next is curd & honey & it’s melt in mouth delicious.... the wife of chief home makes this & you can tell.

Another morning we got pancakes & ice cream the food kept coming & it’s to die for. The best breakfast in all of our Sri Lanka’s stays.

I got bitten & my leg swelled the chief rang the family doctor & his son drove us there & waited with us. Pure kindness shown so thank you...
They just went above & beyond with their kindness & I cannot say enough good things about this place ‘ the family.
 A minute stroll to turtle bay beach perfect location. 
On leaving the chief’s wife gave us homemade cake. They are wonderful hosts & the 2 sons & daughter are very kind always smiling always helping. 

They genuinely care & have your best interest with them.  

So well done to the family of this wonderful guest house they do deserve 5 stars. And more if I can give them.
title: 5 stars for this family run guest house.

text: We went for a family vacation and we simply loved it, rooms are very good (river view stunning) and top quality, very calm, staff is great and super helpful, food was really good and right by the river, boat rides in Bentota river where we saw lots of wildlife, amazing quiet beach where we spent hours and hours, and even a safari ride inland. Kids already asking when will we be going back and I'm sure as soon as Covid restrictions allow, we'll be back for a weekend.

placeInfo/address: 10 Galle Road Moragalla, Beruwala 12070 Sri Lanka
text: Excellent service, clean and cool rooms, very polite staff and good food. Restaurant on the roof is amazing. Pleasant location, nice view and comfortable cafeteria by the river. I really enjoyed three special things in this hotel: fresh fruit juice, massage salon and the idea of taking you to the beach by boat. Btw, there are two beaches around the hotel. You have to go on foot ~5 mins to the first one, but there are lots of people. That's why I preferred the second beach, a boatman takes you there for free. An extremely clean beach and water, free loungers, almost no people. This hotel also offers a service to get you from the airport and back, that's very important as for me. And the prices are reasonable. Hotel staff organized a pleasant tour to Yala Park for me and my friends, that was amazing as well.

placeInfo/address: 10 Galle Road Moragalla, Beruwala 12070 Sri Lanka
text:
We travelled to Sri Lanka in mid October 2019 with in a group of 12, a mix of family and close friends and it was for most of us our first visit to this most incredible country - it won't be our last! Two of our party have stayed in the Arena Hotel many times before and we joined them on their recommendation.

The hotel is great!! The staff are amazing and every single one of them welcomed us as if we were their family. The service is perfect, the food is a wonderful mix of Sri Lankan and world cuisine, lovingly prepared by their amazingly talented and very high class head chef and his team. 

The rooms are spotless and very comfortable, with the most amazing towel art left on your bed every day, ranging from Swans to Crocodiles - just outstanding.

I must make a point of mentioning the most amazing member of staff Nalin.
Nalin made our holiday. He arranged everything from trips to the beach via the hotel's own speedboat to excursions to Galle, wildlife safari's to Yala National Park (where we saw everything from Bee-eaters to Elephants - a simply amazing day!), river trips, fishing trips, he took us wherever we wanted to go in his tuc tuc including the amazing Kande Viharaya Temple (about a mile from the hotel). Nalin introduced us to the real Sri Lanka and it's amazing culture - thank you so much.

By the way, the views from the Arena sky restaurant are amazing!

If like I, you are looking for amazing wildlife and culture, Sri Lanka is the place for you, it's a country of outstanding beauty and sensory overloads!

Would we return to the Arena Hotel? Damned right we would!
In fact, we are panning our next visit in 2020 right now!

We had a holiday of a lifetime and a massive part of this was down to the Arena Hotel and their amazing staff.

We can't thank every one of you enough - See you all again in 2020

If you plan a visit to Sri Lanka, book in at the Arena!!
title: The Arena Hotel - A true Sri Lankan Jewel!

placeInfo/address: 10 Galle Road Moragalla, Beruwala 12070 Sri Lanka
text: I had the pleasure of dining here with a friend for dinner and it could not have been more perfect! A friend of the owner made reservations for us, and the owner took care of everything from that moment onward. From making sure fresh lobster was available, to transporting us to/from the restaurant, he and his staff made sure that everything was seamless for a perfect farewell dinner. Having worked in the restaurant industry for many years, I love meeting others who have a passion for hospitality, and Arena and staff hit all of the marks! The grilled lobster was mouthwatering, accompanied by attentive and friendly service throughout our meal. The cherry on top is the view—the restaurant sits atop the 4-story hotel offering panoramic views of Beruwala, ocean, river, and Buddha statue included :) seeing the sunset without any obstructions was amazing and the perfect way to end our time in Beruwala. On our next visit we hope to check out the hotel—if it is anything like our dinner then I have no doubt it is a wonderful place to stay while visiting Sri Lanka. We will definitely be back!
title: Dinner with a breathtaking 360° view!

text: Okay, yes, this hotel is close to main street and it is a 10 minute walk to the beach... BUT: Elevated European-standard rooms (quiet towards the river), modern bathrooms, everything (!) super-clean! Lovely little bar with wooden terrace besides the river (incl. Italian coffee machine, the cocktails were great)! Perfectly friendly and helpful staff all around!! Dining at the rooftop restaurant was tasty, kitchen and Chefs appeared in perfect condition. Surprise at breakfast: we were an hour late this morning, but no problem, prepared and served us a perfect one without hesitating! And all of that (I guess) half the rate you‘d pay 100 meters down the lane, at beachside. Definitely recommended to those who reach out for European standards at reasonable rates and prices!
title: Splendid alternative!

text:
We stayed at Pegasus Reef for a night, mainly for its location not too far from Colombo and the airport. The hotel has a calm, open feel with a spacious garden and a nice pool area by the sea, which was a lovely spot to unwind after a long journey.

Rooms were clean and spacious, though a bit outdated in design. The bed was comfortable, but the AC was a little loud. The staff were helpful, especially at check-in, and they even managed to accommodate a last-minute request with no fuss. Room service was quick and portions were generous.

However, the food could be better. The buffet didn’t quite match the standard you'd expect for the price, and some dishes lacked flavor. Also, the beach is not really swimmable, more for views than beach lounging.

If you're just looking for a comfortable place to relax near the airport or Colombo, it's a decent pick. But if you're expecting a resort-style beachfront experience or top-tier dining, you might want to explore other options.
title: A Decent Stay Near Colombo - Good for a Night or Two

ownerResponse/text: Thank you for such a thoughtful and heartfelt review. We're so glad your getaway brought the break you were hoping for, and it’s wonderful to hear that the service, food, and atmosphere stood out during your time with us. Your kind words mean a lot to the team, especially those at the main restaurant and The Fishery. We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you and your wife back again for another relaxing escape.
placeInfo/address: Palliyawatha, Wattala 11104 Sri Lanka
text: I spend two days along with my wife at this beautiful location just for a break from the monotony in busy day to day life and we were truly happy mainly on the service levels of the staff specially at the main restaurant and Fishery Seafood restaurant, the quality of food and the mesmerizing atmosphere. It was truly a great value for money and I would like to recommend this place for anyone looking for the above in the close proximity of Colombo.
title: Excellent Service in a mesmerizing atmosphere

text:
I had my French group at Pegasus for a short stay. It's located very near to wattala beach. Just 20 min away from Colombo city. Hotel is nearly 50 years old but still maintained the quality in high. 

Fishery restaurant was highlighted by guests. And very good service was there.

I must specifically thank to Bell captain Bandara and GRO Maduwanthi.
title: Excellent one night stay
